title: 11/15: Start or Sit (NFC); Myles Garrett Reaction and More (Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
What an ugly ending to the PIT-CLE game and we react to Myles Garrett's actions and the actual football stuff from the game. Mason Rudolph struggled but the Browns offense showed some good signs and the schedule is about to get better! ... News and notes (14:00) as David Montgomery and Matthew Stafford are looking iffy. What else do you need to know? Also, get some Stats to Know (19:15) for today's games, "Start, Sit or Flex at Best?" (22:08) and Beat the Waiver WIre (28:30) ... NO-TB (31:22), DAL-DET (40:40), ATL-CAR (49:10), ARI-SF (55:40), CHI-LAR (1:01:15), NYJ-WAS (1:05:00). Can we trust Drew Brees on the road? Kenny Golladay with a backup QB? A lot of Brian Hill talk and all the Flex questions you can handle ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Start or Sit for the NFC home games and a recap of PIT-CLE and that ugly incident a the end of the game.
